MACD.note: Tested with 111 trials, significant improvement over default (12,26,9)

ADX.note: Excellent performance with lower threshold and shorter period

Supertrend.note: Outstanding performance with longer period and very low multiplier (default: 10,3.0)

performance_improvements.Supertrend: 9344% return - exceptional performance with optimized parameters

recommended_usage.MACD: Use fast=15, slow=26, signal=8 instead of default 12,26,9
recommended_usage.ADX: Use period=10, threshold=20.99 for stronger trend detection
recommended_usage.Supertrend: Use period=19, multiplier=1.002 instead of default 10,3.0 - massive improvement!
recommended_usage.note: These parameters optimized for GARAN, may need adjustment for other symbols
